name: Ulises
overview: In one of his many trips, Ulysses, king of Ithaca, was shipwrecked, losing his ship and the crew. Ulysses manages to swim to an unknown island. There, its inhabitants entrust the mission to rescue twelve maidens who have been kidnapped by "Circe", perverse sorceress who has frightened the whole island, Circe has the help of minotaurs, spirits, centaurs and a dangerous cyclops. Ulysses must rescue them before they are sacrificed, and thus have the help from the islanders to return to Ithaca. Ulysses will have to cross dangerous cliffs and jungles on his way to the sorceress's castle. He will face terrible enemies, from dead revived with encampments to mythological beings of nightmare. With his powerful mace he will have to make his way mercilessly, only Ulysses will be able to save the maidens!
